itemInfo.itemDesc: A Processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.\n- How to Obtain: It can be Produced at Mansha Forest, Phoniel's Cabin, and Treant Forest. It can be also be obtained by Lumbering Fir Trees.

item.name: Calpheon Fishing Rod
item.desc: Calpheon fishing rod. ...And it was super effective!\nCan be enhanced with Blackstone (Weapon).

item.name: Fir Timber Crate
item.desc: A Trade Item containing 10 planks of Fir Timber.

item.name: Yuria Longbow
item.desc: A longbow possessed with a hatred for Humankind.

item.name: Fir Plywood
item.desc:
A Processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.

- How to Obtain: It can be also be obtained by Chopping Fir Timber. It requires the knowledge of Chopping: Beginner.

※ Find Lebyos in Heidel and complete the Working the Ash Tree Quest to obtain related knowledge.

※ In order to perform the Quest for Beginner Processing knowledge, achieve Gathering Level 14 or higher and visit Ficy in Heidel to complete the corresponding Quest. Refer to the Black Spirit Guide (/key) for detailed information.

item.name: Fir Plank
item.desc: A Processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.\n\n- How to Obtain: It can be also be obtained by Chopping Fir Timber.

item.name: Ultimate Yuria Longbow
item.desc:
A Yuria Longbow developed to its maximum potential.
There is a small chance this will be developed when Refining a common Yuria Longbow.

- Repair to Max. Durability: Yuria Longbow of Crimson Flame, Yuria Longbow of Destruction, Yuria Longbow of Temptation, Longbow Temptation

item.name: Yuria Longbow of Temptation
item.desc:
The energy of Temptation is contained within this Yuria Longbow.
It can be developed by Refining a common Yuria Longbow.

- Repair to Max. Durability: Yuria Longbow of Temptation, Yuria Longbow

item.name: Yuria Longbow of Destruction
item.desc:
The energy of Destruction is contained within this Yuria Longbow.
It can be developed by Refining a common Yuria Longbow.

- Repair to Max. Durability: Yuria Longbow of Destruction, Yuria Longbow

item.name: Yuria Longbow of Crimson Flame
item.desc:
The energy of Crimson Flame is contained within this Yuria Longbow.
It can be developed by Refining a common Yuria Longbow.

- Repair to Max. Durability: Yuria Longbow of Crimson Flame, Yuria Longbow
